parameters.name: EndTime
parameters.description: The end time of the alert events that you want to query. Specify the time in the YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss format.

parameters.name: Page
parameters.description: The number of the page to return.

parameters.name: Size
parameters.description: The number of entries to return on each page.

parameters.name: StartTime
parameters.description: The start time of the alert events that you want to query. Specify the time in the YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss format.

parameters.name: Status
parameters.description:
The status of the alert events. Valid values:

*   Active
*   Silenced
*   Resolved
